meta.review_content:
Frustration with the customer care number, all I  get is the bot, who confidently says thank you and hangs up on me without resolving my issue.  All  morning I have been calling to the same thing.

Is  there an option  to talk to someone? for actual assistance?  this bot  a waste of my time , patience and just ruins my day - if this is what Vodacom aims to do , well  then as confidently as the bot say  thank you and well done .
